程序包 univers

类 Prof_Berserker

java.lang.Object
univers.Prof_Berserker
所有已实现的接口:
Profession
public class Prof_Berserker extends Object implements Profession
The Berserker profession class that implements the Profession interface. This class provides methods for modifying health points (HP), attack power, and mana points (MP) for a Berserker character, as well as defining and using specific skills unique to this profession.
